title: Most popular social media apps in the U.S. 2019 , by audience
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Million unique visitors for 21 number of Platforms.
The maximum Million unique visitors 169.76 is found at Platform Facebook (main) and the minimum is found at WeChat where Platform is 1.48.
The highest value at Platform Facebook (main) is 114.7x times more than the lowest value at WeChat.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Million unique visitors for 21 number of Platforms.
The maximum Million unique visitors 169.76 is found at Platform Facebook (main) and the minimum is found at WeChat where Platform is 1.48.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Million unique visitors for 21 number of Platforms.
The maximum Million unique visitors 169.76 is found at Platform Facebook (main) and the minimum is found at WeChat where Platform is 1.48.
The highest value at Platform Facebook (main) is 114.7x times more than the lowest value at WeChat.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Million unique visitors for 21 number of Platforms.
The Million unique visitors is highest at Platform Facebook (main) and lowest at Platform WeChat.
The second highest Million unique visitors is appeared to be the Platform Instagram (main).
The difference of Million unique visitors between the highest and lowest Platform is 168.28.
The Platform Facebook (main) has the highest Million unique visitors, followed by Instagram (main), and Facebook Messenger. Down to the Platform WeChat which is the lowest.
The average Million unique visitors in all 21 Platforms is 36.82.
The Million unique visitors is 773.29 if we add up values of all Platforms.
